markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 593 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- This ash staff is decorated with animals; wielding it, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify conjuration magic. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Conjuration **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
  • **1st** [_summon construct_](/Spells.aspx?ID=318), [_unseen servant_](/Spells.aspx?ID=352)
  • **2nd** [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [_phantom steed_](/Spells.aspx?ID=221), _summon construct_, [_summon elemental_](/Spells.aspx?ID=320)
Staff of Conjuration (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_stinking cloud_](/Spells.aspx?ID=309), _summon construct_, _summon elemental_
  • **4th** [_creation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=54), _phantom steed_, _summon construct_, _summon elemental_
Staff of Conjuration (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_black tentacles_](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), _summon construct_, _summon elemental_
  • **6th** _phantom steed_, _summon construct_, _summon elemental_
name: Staff of Conjuration
